Tim - Looks like you may be able to pass this one to Gorkem, but assigning to
you first since it is affecting the Geronimo server.

Gorkem, I can't reproduce this using eclipse 3.1 & the WTP 6/30 build - but I
thought I'd let you take a look at it in case it rings a bell.

Tim, I could not repro as well. This can happen only if the serverdef file can
not be resolved to a URI but I can not think of a reason for the moment. I have
also checked if this is related to Geronimo plugin being jarred but no luck.
Closing old bugs that haven't had any activity in a long time.
